title: Hillary Clinton’s Book Tour Parallels An Early Presidential Campaign
teaser: NPR’s David Folkenflik talks about Clinton’s interviews and whether the tour is the latest step in a 2016 presidential bid.
contentencoded:
Hillary Clinton’s book, “Hard Choices,” is a carefully crafted reflection of her time as U.S. Secretary of State, filled with behind-the-scenes insights.

Her book tour is equally deliberate, featuring interviews with a few select media outlets and a few select topics from her book.

NPR’s David Folkenflik joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to talk about Clinton’s interviews and whether the tour is the latest step in a 2016 presidential bid.

  • See more media analysis from David Folkenflik

Guest

  • David Folkenflik, media correspondent for NPR. He tweets @davidfolkenflik.
